name: nano_ruins
description:
An entry for the Dungeon Crawler Jam 2022

This is a solo RPG in the style of old games like Eye of the Beholder or Dungeon Master.

You play a nano junker on a quest to scavange the ruins of a dead world, which was ravaged by the grey goo of nano technology gone crazy.

The junker needs to find a power source, deep in a destroyed and nano converted city. This is the only hope for his tribe of survivers, to live another day.

Fight through nano creatures, level your shield, stamina or damage and find items to stay alive.
